thought: The aiCompletion action requires input_data to contain the 'messages' field inside the 'json' key for each item. Currently, action_0 is called with empty list [], causing KeyError. I will rewrite action_0 to pass input_data containing one item with 'json' key holding 'messages' list with system and user prompts to generate a joke within 30 words.
plan: Rewrite action_0 to pass input_data with one item containing 'json' key holding 'messages' list with system and user prompts.
Set params to empty dict {} as aiCompletion ignores params.
Test action_0 alone to verify it returns output with joke text.
Update mainWorkflow to use the corrected action_0 output.
Implement action_1 params to send email with joke text.
criticism: The main weakness is misunderstanding the input_data format for aiCompletion. Passing empty list causes no AI call and KeyError in mainWorkflow.
